reallocation.confirm-text: Do you really want to Reallocate Fund?
reallocation.title: Reallocation
reallocation.text-2: There is a mandatory 1% GVT allocation per Fund.
reallocation.text-3: * You are able to reallocate 3% of the Fund per day (cumulative). Example: you will be able to change 30% of the Fund's allocation after 10 days.
